description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans diverse topics like digital fragmentation, decentralization, and innovative practices. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his interdisciplinary approach, exploring concepts from philosophy, technology, and social systems to address global challenges and promote sustainable, interconnected communities.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, combines academia and tech to transform education and foster inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores digital fragmentation, decentralization, and innovative practices for sustainable, interconnected communities.
